name: Add/Edit Properties Section Functionality
description: Verify that within the ”Properties” section of a Multibranch Pipeline configuration, the user can add and edit custom properties that apply to all branches or define job-level behaviors.
descriptionHtml: Verify that within the ”Properties” section of a Multibranch Pipeline configuration, the user can add and edit custom properties that apply to all branches or define job-level behaviors.

Clear Jenkins data before each test run.

steps.name: Clean up Jenkins data.
Delete all existing jobs and views for the user session.
Extract Jenkins crumb token from HTML response.

beforeStages.name: Create new multibranch pipeline project with name "Multibranch_Pipeline_Project"

steps.name: Create new Multibranch Pipeline project: "'Multibranch_Pipeline_Project'"

testStage.description: Verify that within the ”Properties” section of a Multibranch Pipeline configuration, the user can add and edit custom properties that apply to all branches or define job-level behaviors.

steps.name: Get Properties section element
Wait for the element to be visible
Scroll to element
In the Properties section, click “Add Property”
Wait for the element to be visible
Assert new property added
Enter the name of property
Click the “Save” button at the bottom of the page

Redirect to the project
's main page

Assert redirecting to the project
's main page completed
Re-enter the Configure page
Get Properties section element
Wait for the element to be visible
Scroll to element
Verify that the added and edited property values are correctly saved and displayed
Assert added/edited property value is correctly saved and displayed
